item.title: Foxy - Сoloring by number dots
item.description: Link to AppStore Main features and frameworks: - used Firebase’s services (Database, Storage, Cloud Messaging, Remote Config) - drawing pictures using CoreGraphics - creating picture coloring videos using AVFoundation - for remote push notification OneSignal is integrated - ads integration using IronSource - for database CoreData is used - auto-renewable subscriptions are implemented using StoreKit - implementation of analytics (Amplitude, YandexMetrica, FacebookCore) - Crashlytics is used for bug tracking - Fabric for Beta testing and etc.

item.title: Boo - Chat stories
item.description: Link to AppStore Main features and frameworks: - JSON parsing uses Codable protocol and JSONSerialization - local notifications are implemented using UserNotifications - for remote push notification OneSignal is integrated - interaction with RESTful services using Alamofire - for database CoreData is used - auto-renewable subscriptions are implemented using StoreKit - implementation of analytics (Amplitude, YandexMetrica) - Crashlytics is used for bug tracking and other frameworks: Security, AVFoundation.
